Session 6 - 4/28/2025

Session Notes

Source: Campaign Source Notes.

Highlights

  • Recap: [Heroes without a Team Name sounds like a pretty cool team name?] We went to Billowbarrow and got goosey/Porygon2 homunculus familiar worth 50k gold worth which only the potentate could even pay. As we are leaving we see the helic...
  • Now!
  • Bart takes a lot of damage from the pit..
  • One teenage girl has a spear with a human child skull that has blood all over from beating people…
  • Antler queen’s face is obscured with deer skin. But we see a hunger for violence in her eyes.
  • Another teen has completely dilated pupils, holding a book that looks like an adorned book of scripture
  • Another teen looks traumatized, she just looks super scared though she looks like she might be a leader, she has a bunch of spears on her back
  • Another teen, blonde, glasses, looks excited about catching something in the pit
  • Three more that are very forgettable and nameless
  • Misty cuts off my hair…Antler queen adds it to her gown.
  • I ask for safe passage which the Antler queen says she will permit as long as we survive the hunts tomorrow.
  • Oldyoungkenjamin sneaks away, his only good roll basically ever
  • We arrived at camp. Yurts from branches.
  • Antler queen looks at the spellcaster one - laddie? Laudie? - and tells her to give us her brew.
